summary: An extremely strange and overpowered spell that generally kills everything that is weak and pathetic. Also for fun it will throw people across the floor.
descriptionHtml:
An extremely strange and overpowered spell that generally kills everything that is weak and pathetic.
 Also for fun it will throw people across the floor. Though if you angle it right they do go flying through the air.
If bored make someone follow you to a high place and \"push\" them off >:).
So basically its an overpowered unrelenting force shout that does a hell of a lot more damage.
Note:
May not work on followers but will set them on fire and deal the majority of the damage.
Can also be found in the Dragonsreach Great Porch on the floor near the table.
Bugs:
Doesn\'t seem to work without Phendrix\'s skyrim school of witchcraft and wizardry which is an amazing mod anyway.
Does sometimes heal those hit.
If you download only the main file if those who are dead are hit by the spell they get up and anyone hit by the spell will have a ball of light over their head.
Seems to replace all instances of magelight.
Doesn\'t have any glowy hand things which I\'m trying to fix.
Requires:
Skyrim-Duh
Dragonborn
SKSE
The main file

And if you find any bugs tell me.
author: This isnt really an original idea now is it
